name: Codility
body:
The Codility repo is an effort to share solutions to computer science problems with the developer community.
Since I am also very interested in clean and beautiful code, I have made an effort to show that it is possible to solve these kinds of problems while maintaining high quality, easily understandable code.
I feel that this type of code promotes education and reuse which are the corner stones of better craftsmanship and integrity in our trade.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
